Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: Low Hui Pheng
Reviews.Content: Pretty good stuff here..great skin & battery life & good camera pixel.Comfortable screen size for ebook reading.US adapter was included in the box. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: connieshen530
Reviews.Content: I love this phone except it cannot offer the 4G data in America. But I get wifi anywhere so I don't now whether should I return it.
